statements: SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) as avg_amount, MAX(transaction_amount) as max_amount, MIN(transaction_amount) as min_amount FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 7;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(transaction_id) as transaction_count FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(transaction_amount) > 3;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01' OR transaction_amount < 500 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_amount FROM customer_details JOIN customer_transactions ON customer_details.customer_id = customer_transactions.customer_id;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM customer_transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customer_details;
SELECT * FROM customer_transactions ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_details WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%555%'
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM customer_transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_transactions INNER JOIN customer_details ON customer_transactions.customer_id = customer_details.customer_id

SELECT customer_name, AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_amount FROM customer_transactions INNER JOIN customer_details ON customer_transactions.customer_id = customer_details.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY average_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, balance FROM accounts WHERE account_type = 'Savings';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_transactions;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM customer_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT account_id, customer_id, account_balance FROM accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT category_name FROM transaction_categories WHERE category_id > 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT customer_name, account_balance FROM customers JOIN accounts ON customers.customer_id = accounts.customer_id;

SELECT category_name, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM customer_transactions JOIN transaction_categories ON customer_transactions.category_id = transaction_categories.category_id GROUP BY category_name;

SELECT customer_name, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_spent FROM customers JOIN customer_transactions ON customers.customer_id = customer_transactions.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_records;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_details WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT category_name, category_description FROM transaction_categories ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, balance FROM customer_details JOIN account_balance ON customer_details.customer_id = account_balance.customer_id;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transaction_records WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_records ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, transaction_amount ASC
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_details WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%555%'
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, transaction_amount FROM transaction_records WHERE transaction_amount > 1000
SELECT category_name, category_description FROM transaction_categories WHERE category_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM account_balance INNER JOIN customer_details ON account_balance.customer_id = customer_details.customer_id
